activation.reactionTrigger: A creature that can hear or see you or a device you are piloting makes an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw

system.description:
At 1st level, you have an infuriating ability to distract, goad, or otherwise throw your opponents off their game at just the right moment. This takes the form of a Dastardly Gambit die, a d6. When a creature that can hear or see you or a device you are piloting makes an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, you can use your reaction to expend a use of Dastardly Gambit, rolling a Dastardly Gambit die and subtracting the number rolled from the creatureâ€™s roll.

You can choose to use this feature after the creature makes its roll. You have a number of Dastardly Gambit dice equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum one). You regain any expended Dastardly Gambit dice when you finish a long rest.

At 5th level your Dastardly Gambit die increases to a d8, at 10th level it increases to a d10, and at 15th level it increases to a d12.
